nodes.text: De'Rruyet Industries, also known as De'Rruyet Tech, was a company active during the Imperial Era, founded by Beol De'Rruyet. De'Rruyet claimed to possess an ancient Nihil Path engine and have the ability to replicate it, which would lead to the rediscovery of a long-lost method of lightspeed travel. Domina Tagge of the Tagge family wished to prevent De'Rruyet from unveiling the technology, recruiting the rogue archaeologist Doctor Chelli Aphra to learn the details of the device.
